0.question:
Consider a biased spinner with eight sections - five violet sections and three hazel sections. The spinner will be spun 15 times and the sequence of violets (V) and hazels (H) will be recorded. You are asked to select one sequence, from a set of three, and you will win $40 if the sequence you chose appears on successive spins of the spinner.Which sequence do you prefer to bet?
(a) VHHVHVHHH.
(b) VHHVHVHHV.
(c) VHHVVVHHV.

1.question:
Consider a regular seven-sided spinner with five teal sections and two white sections. The spinner will be spun 25 times and the sequence of teals (T) and whites (W) will be recorded. You are asked to select one sequence, from a set of three, and you will win $30 if the sequence you chose appears on successive spins of the spinner.Which sequence do you prefer to bet?
(a) TWTTTWWWW.
(b) TWTTTWTWT.
(c) TTWTTTWWW.

2.question:
Consider a regular eight-sided die with five orange faces and three teal faces. The die will be rolled 15 times and the sequence of oranges (O) and teals (T) will be recorded. You are asked to select one sequence, from a set of three, and you will win $50 if the sequence you chose appears on successive rolls of the die.Which sequence do you prefer to bet?
(a) OTOTO.
(b) OTOOO.
(c) OOOOO.

3.question:
Consider a regular eight-sided die with six hazel faces and two pink faces. The die will be rolled 15 times and the sequence of hazels (H) and pinks (P) will be recorded. You are asked to select one sequence, from a set of three, and you will win $30 if the sequence you chose appears on successive rolls of the die.Which sequence do you prefer to bet?
(a) HPHHHPH.
(b) HPHHHPP.
(c) HPPHHPP.

4.question:
Consider a regular eight-sided spinner with five blue sections and three magenta sections. The spinner will be spun 15 times and the sequence of blues (B) and magentas (M) will be recorded. You are asked to select one sequence, from a set of three, and you will win $30 if the sequence you chose appears on successive spins of the spinner.Which sequence do you prefer to bet?
(a) MBBBMBMB.
(b) MBBBMMBM.
(c) MMBBMMBM.
